snippet: The Knicks have one of the oldest lineups ever assembled in the N.B.A., while last season’s bright young star, Jeremy Lin, is playing elsewhere.
abstract: Bill Pennington On Pro Basketball column notes that New York Knicks found success over Miami Heat despite having one of the oldest lineups ever assembled in NBA; argues that the current starting team is in stark contrast to the youthfulness of the previous season, when point guard Jeremy Lin became a media sensation.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks have one of the oldest lineups ever assembled in the N.B.A., while last season’s bright young star, Jeremy Lin, is playing elsewhere.

headline.seo: Knicks Begin Season Devoid of Jeremy Lin, and Youth
headline.main: Knicks Begin Season Scrubbed of Lin and Youth
headline.print_headline:
Knicks Begin Season
Scrubbed of Lin
And Youth
